devdoc.details: Factory contract for creating standard remote token representations of local ERC20s. This can be used to bridge native L1 ERC20s to L2 or native L2 ERC20s to L1. The tokens created through this factory are meant to operate with the StandardBridge contract for deposits/withdrawals. This contract is a predeploy on L2 at 0x4200000000000000000000000000000000000012 TODO: deploy to a deterministic address on L1 networks? TODO: should this be extended for L1/L2 with hardcoded values in the base contract's initialize?

createStandardL2Token(address,string,str.details: Creates an instance of the standard ERC20 token on L2.

params._remoteToken: Address of the corresponding L1 token.

initialize(address).details: Initialize the factory On L2 _bridge should be Lib_PredeployAddresses.L2_STANDARD_BRIDGE, On L1 _bridge should be the L1StandardBridge

devdoc.title: OptimismMintableTokenFactory
